Package eu.wauz.wauzcore.items

This package contains general classes for creating and interacting with custom items.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DurabilityCalculator
    Used to calculate the durability of equipment items.
    EquipmentParameters
    Parameters of equipment items, for usage in identifiers.
    InventoryItemRemover
    A class to count and remove specific items from a player inventory.
    InventoryStringConverter
    A class to serialize and deserialize player inventories, including stats, to a character file.
    WauzEquipment
    A class that represents a base type of equipment.
    WauzRewards
    A collection of static methods to pay out currency rewards to players.
    WauzScrolls
    A class for handling the usage of scrolls and socketable items.
    WauzSigns
    A class for handling the usage of event signs.

Package eu.wauz.wauzcore.items Description

This package contains general classes for creating and interacting with custom items.
